system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} to be found worthy of Gungnir, quest to find it, and wield it...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} +edge by throwing Gungnir at a foe with mystical accuracy, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit as the spear's runes of blaze brightly.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}, you may decide before rolling to subtract -2 from the highest challenge die. If you do and miss, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress) as Gungnir's power falters.

Once per battle when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} and miss, you may call on the power of Odin. If you do, you may reroll any dice.
